contentfulBlogPost.title: #DesignBuildLaunch24: I launched my digital product in 24 hours

body.raw: {"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"heading-2","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"WE'VE LAUNCHED ü•≥","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"#DesignBuildLaunch24 - this was where the story for Glory Morning began.","marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"‚èÆÔ∏è  Rewind back a few weeks, I put myself up to a personal challenge. A challenge that pushes the boundaries of my creativity, processes, and efficiency (#OCD).","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"But, also a challenge that pours fuel directly into my passion to design and build digital products.","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"heading-4","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"üí°  So, what product do I build?","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"I spent hours chewing on this question. Going through my \"idea notepad\", reviewing what I'd scribbled down in the past. But nothing ","marks":[],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"text","value":"really","marks":[{"type":"italic"}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"text","value":" had a purpose for me, or others alike.","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Then it happened. Our youngest had just dropped off to sleep, while the idea dropped on me.","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"heading-4","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"üß©  It's purpose?","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"I spend most of time working solo from my home office, which isn't always party poppers and unicorn cupcakes. I‚Äôve seen and experienced how hard and isolating it can become.","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"It's a physical and mental rollercoaster for your health. You can quickly become trapped in an isolated bubble of: eat, sleep, work, kids, repeat.","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"#FunFact: I'm a big supporter of the hybrid working policy.","marks":[{"type":"italic"}],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"I‚Äôve ALSO seen and experienced how de-motivating and 'on the back burner' it can be to keep at a new hobby when you‚Äôre not surrounded by like-minded people.","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"As Dan Buettner once said -","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"blockquote","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"\"The people you surround yourself with influence your behaviours, so choose friends who have healthy habits\"","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"And that is where Glory Morning will slot into place.","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"A welcoming and ","marks":[],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"hyperlink","data":{"uri":"https://glorymorning.email/public/?utm_campaign=dripfed&utm_source=blog"},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"vibrant community of like-minded people, who want to meet someone new every single morning. Connect through passions, hobbies, and professions with others you might never meet elsewhere, all from your inbox.","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"text","value":"","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Start your day inspired.","marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Your feedback is very valuable to me. I see an exciting opportunity for a diverse audience with Glory Morning. Connecting directly with like-minded people, all right from your inbox.","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"I look forward to seeing you join our community at ","marks":[],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"hyperlink","data":{"uri":"https://glorymorning.email/public/?utm_campaign=dripfed&utm_source=blog"},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"glorymorning.email","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"text","value":" üôå","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"heading-3","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"üé• The video","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"As this started out as a self challenge, I did in fact recorded the whole design and build process as a time-lapse.","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Check it out on YouTube at ","marks":[],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"hyperlink","data":{"uri":"https://youtu.be/e4UjbLcO2Hs"},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"https://youtu.be/e4UjbLcO2Hs","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"text","value":".","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Let me know what you think ü§ü","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}
